name: Face Bento Cream Bronzer, Powder Blush & Highlighter Sculpting Trio
about: What it is:A powder blush, powder highlighter, and cream bronzer with a creamy and blendable texture, housed in a pocket-sized palette stack..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, phthalates, and sulfates SLS & SLES. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:These pocket-sized stacks of blush, highlighter, and bronzer trios apply like butter and blend effortlessly into a cream-to-powder finish. Theyu2019re infused with Mangifera indica (mango) seed butter to help the formula blend seamlessly while moisturizing the skin..This Set Contains:Size:
ingredients: 01 Coral Crumbs Ingredients: Talc, Nylon-12, Silica, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Magnesium Myristate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Red 30 (Ci 73360), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Magnesium Stearate, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Methylpropanediol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Dimethicone, Propanediol, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Tin Oxide, Aqua/Water/Eau...02 Gold Drip Ingredients: Dimethicone, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica (Ci 77019), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Diisostearyl Malate, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Phenyl Trimethicone, Sorbitan Sesquiisostearate, Aluminum Distearate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil Isostearate, Synthetic Wax, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Phenoxyethanol, Propanediol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Tin Oxide, Silica...03 More Macchiato Ingredients: Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Barium Sulfate, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Silica, Sorbitan Isostearate, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Paraffin, Polyethylene, Methyl Hydrogenated Rosinate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77499), Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Silica Silylate, Cera Microcristallina/Microcrystalline Wax/Cire Microcristalline, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Magnesium Myristate, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Propylene Carbonate, Fragrance (Parfum)
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply with fingers or tool to create your own custom full face look..-Use each alone or in different combinations to create your unique makeup look...*Kutie Tip: Apply the bronzer first with a makeup brush as you apply just below your cheekbone, and then follow up by placing blush on the apples of your cheeks. Complete the look with highlighter on your upper cheekbones, nose, forehead and chin to stack these powders for a custom full-face look that adds dimension to your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Face Bento Cream Bronzer, Powder Blush & Highlighter Sculpting Trio by Kaja! This trio is my go-to for achieving a natural, sun-kissed glow. The cream bronzer blends effortlessly, giving my skin a warm and radiant look. The powder blush adds a lovely flush of color to my cheeks, and the highlighter provides the perfect touch of luminosity. The compact packaging is convenient for on-the-go touch-ups, making it an essential part of my daily makeup routine. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a versatile and easy-to-use face sculpting trio.

Super fashionable as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Cream Bronzer, Powder Blush & Highlighter Sculpting Trio is a versatile and essential addition to any makeup collection. The cream bronzer provides a natural sun-kissed glow with a smooth and blendable texture. The powder blush adds a flattering flush to the cheeks, offering buildable color for both subtle and bold looks. The highlighter delivers a luminous finish, enhancing the high points of the face effortlessly. The packaging is sleek and practical, making it easy to travel with. Overall, a must-have for those seeking a convenient all-in-one solution for a polished and radiant complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disclosure: This product was gifted by Kaja to me for my honest review. I recently had the pleasure of trying out the Kaja Face Bento Cream Bronzer, Powder Blush, and Highlight sculpting trio, and let me tell you, it exceeded all my expectations! This trio has quickly become an essential part of my daily makeup routine, and I couldn't be happier with the results it delivers. Starting with the packaging, Kaja once again impresses with its sleek, compact design. The three products are neatly housed in a convenient, stackable case that is perfect for travel or on-the-go touch-ups. The mirror included is an added bonus, making it incredibly convenient and efficient. Now, let's talk about the formulas. The cream bronzer is an absolute dream to work with. Its smooth texture blends effortlessly onto the skin, creating a natural-looking warmth and dimension. The buildable formula allows for a sheer application or a more intense, sculpted look, depending on your preference. It has a beautiful satin finish that gives a healthy glow without any greasiness. The powder blush in this trio is equally impressive. The finely milled powder applies smoothly and evenly, providing a pop of color that truly brightens up the complexion. It has a great color payoff, allowing you to achieve a subtle flush or a more intense blush, depending on your desired level of intensity. The shade range is versatile and flattering, catering to a variety of skin tones. Last but not least, the highlighter in this trio is absolutely stunning. The finely milled powder imparts a luminous, lit-from-within glow that enhances the high points of the face. It's not overly glittery or chunky, but rather gives a sophisticated, natural radiance. I love how it catches the light and gives my skin a gorgeous, ethereal sheen. What sets this sculpting trio apart is its versatility. Whether you prefer a cream or powder formulation, this trio has you covered.

reviews.review_text: I received this Play Bento Cream Bronzer, Powder Blush and Highlighter Sculpting Trio complimentary from Kaja Beauty to try out and review in exchange for my honest opinion. I received this trio set in the color shade option Cloud Latte 02 for medium skin tones which includes the blush in the color Coral Crumbs 01, the highlighter in the color Gold Drip 02, and the bronzer in the color More Macchiato 03. The powder blush and highlighter are both very pretty, sparkly shades, while the cream bronzer is a pretty matte shade. Overall, I think this is a useful little trio!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: If you hate sponsored reviews, donu2019t read this.

reviews.review_text: First off, I would like to say this review is only happening because the product was gifted by Kaja. That means I didnu2019t buy the product, not that Kaja bought my integrity. I love the cute little compact, how little space it takes up, and how perfect she is for travel. The blush and highlight are so fitting for my skin tone, the bronzer however, is a little too warm for my preferences.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First and foremost, I have to say that the packaging for this product is absolutely adorable. The compact size makes it perfect for on-the-go touch-ups, and the unique triangle shape is not only visually appealing, but also helps to prevent the product from rolling around or getting lost in a makeup bag.  But the real star of the show here is the makeup itself. The Mochamellow shade is perfect for creating a natural, sun-kissed look that is perfect for summer. The trio includes a shimmery highlighter, a blush, and a bronzer, all of which blend seamlessly together to create a flawless finish.  One of the things I love most about this trio is how versatile it is. You can use each shade individually, or blend them together for a customized look that suits your skin tone perfectly. And the formula itself is top-notch - it goes on smoothly, stays put all day, and doesn't settle into fine lines or pores.  Overall, I would highly recommend Kaja's Play Bento Makeup Trio in Mochamellow to anyone looking for a high-quality, versatile, and beautiful makeup product. It's definitely worth the investment, and I'm sure you'll love it as much as I do!  Gifted by Kaja!

reviews.review_text: This is my very first Bento product and while I was many had told me that they were highly pigmented I was not really prepared for just how much!! reviews.review_text: I love the unique stacked trio packaging! It is easy to take it on the go. I feel more organized when it is packaged together. I like that the formula is creamy and glides easily. The shades are stunning! This was gifted by kajabeauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how versatile this trio is! I use this everyday for the face and eyes. Itu2019s amazing for that summery and natural look. When I use them on the face as well as my eyes everything looks so cohesive and clean. I keep it in my purse for traveling since it is the perfect size. Each pot is so richly pigmented they will literally last forever before you hit pan because you only need to dip into it sparingly! Absolutely love this for my daily makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore the Kaja Play Bento in Cloud Latte! The stacked trio packaging is not only visually appealing but also incredibly practical, allowing me to effortlessly switch between shades without any mess or hassle. It's the perfect companion for on-the-go application, as the product is compact, lightweight, and easy to use, making touch-ups a breeze. The formula feels luxurious and velvety on the skin, providing a smooth and seamless application with a stunning, natural finish that lasts all day. Complimentary from Kaja.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I adore Kaja for their pretty and cutest packaging! Quality of products are good too. I got the Cloud Latte this time because i already own the Butter Up and both are great for my light to medium skin tone. I like taking this for travel or just getting ready on the go since it contains a blush, bronzer and highlighter in 1 compact container. Love this! ud83dudc95 gifted by Kaja

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Face Bento Cream Bronzer, Powder Blush & Highlighter Sculpting Trio from Kaja and I must say, I am absolutely in love with it! This versatile and high-quality sculpting product has become a staple in my makeup routine and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Let me start by talking about the packaging. The stacked trio packaging is not only practical but also incredibly convenient. It's compact and easy to carry around, which makes it perfect for on-the-go touch-ups. I love how everything is kept together and I never have to worry about misplacing any of the products. As someone who is always on the move, I appreciate products that are easy to use on the go. That's why I love this trio so much! The product is incredibly easy to use and apply, even when I'm in a rush. It blends seamlessly and gives me a flawless look every single time. Whether I'm at work, running errands, or traveling, I can always count on this trio to give me the perfect sculpted look. Of course, the most important aspect of any makeup product is how it feels and looks on the skin. The formula for this trio is simply amazing! It feels smooth and creamy and blends effortlessly. The bronzer, blush, and highlighter all work together perfectly to give me a gorgeous natural glow. I've received so many compliments on my makeup since I started using this trio, and I always recommend it to anyone who asks. In conclusion, if you're looking for a versatile and high-quality sculpting product, you can't go wrong with the Kaja Face Bento Cream Bronzer, Powder Blush & Highlighter Sculpting Trio. The packaging is practical, the product is easy to use, and the formula is simply amazing. I couldn't be happier with my purchase and I'm sure you'll love it too! Gifted by Kaja.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This set is so practical, itu2019s absolutely perfect to keep in your makeup bag for on the go! Such a neat idea. Also the colors are absolutely even more beautiful in person! The highlighter is gorgeous and super shiny!  Gifted by Kaja

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The most amazing trio that I never knew existed. Itu2019s the most beautiful little container in the most beautiful package that holds three of the most important skin make up that I use in one beautiful palette stack. The pigmentation of the highlighter and the blush is amazing , the bronzer is creamy and it blends in so perfectly. I canu2019t say enough good things about this trio. Itu2019s so small and super convenient to fit in any to go little bag. I got the sugar cookie, itu2019s best shades for my skin tone.I would highly recommend it to anyone. Gifted by kaja

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Kaja has now become my Holy Grail! I love the packaging as everyone else does, but this bento is pure perfection. I have light skin with a cool undertone, and I choose the lightest variant. The contour was what originally caught my eye, and it's a cream formula! The highlighter is a bit different from their highlighter bento, but in a good way! It has just enough shimmer to where it doesn't leave fallout. I used a cream blush, and I applied this powder over the top!  The finished look was so polished, and I had the best makeup day ever thanks to this all in one, easy to travel with gem! I highly suggest picking this up asap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This trio by Kaja is a game changer for traveling! I love that I have three amazing products in one small, sleek design. The formulation of the products are amazing. They glide on my skin and blend out tremendously. You also get a generous amount of each product in this trio stack. I love the extended shade range. 10/10 product! Complimentary from Kaja.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite product to pack in my travel bag. I love the cream counter color, it's the perfect shade to give my face some definition. The blush and highlight color are super flattering too. Recieved complimentary from kajabeauty for review.

reviews.review_title: Great for on the go makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this bento complimentary from Kaja Beauty. I love that this bento has the three basic products that I need on the go for every day make up. The shade of the blush and highlighter were absolutely perfect for my skin tone. They also were highly pigmented and super blendable. The contour bronzer could be a little lighter for my skin tone, but I think itu2019s just a matching issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Face Bento Cream Bronzer, Powder Blush & Highlighter Sculpting Trio in Sugar Cookie complimentary from Kaja. Iu2019m really enjoying this stacked trio as I think itu2019s super easy to use and will be great for travel. I love how easy the cream bronzer is to apply and the powder blush is super pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a cute makeup item! I love the colors and they look great in my skintone! I love the convenience of it. This is great for travel or putting in your purse. Love the shade expansion! Gifted by kaja beauty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Kaja Play Bento in MochaMallow is such a wonderful cheek/face trio. I love the blush color is so pigmented. The highlight is great above the cheekbone and as an eyeshadow. The cream contour is very pigmented and when blended out looks amazing. This is perfect for very tan or deep skintones. This was gifted by Kaja.

reviews.review_title: High quality, handy, a great value
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this a year ago, and itu2019s become a super handy staple.  The contour is a great color (for me at least) and has a great cream consistency.  Iu2019ve used it under and over foundation, even over setting powder.  Great for contour but also bronzer, itu2019s neither shimmery nor fully matte, Iu2019d describe it as slightly dewy?  The blush is a gorgeous color and applies and blends well.  A few light brushes of the highlighter ties it together.  Itu2019s awesome to be able to contour, blush, and highlight with one container and they blend together well.  I have similar products that cost way more but this one always wins the prime spot in my u201cdaily bare necessitiesu201d makeup bag.  Also Iu2019ve dropped it many times and nothing has broken (container or product).  This bento, a brow pencil, and a complimentary lip color make for a well-stocked mini-bag.

reviews.review_title: My new go to face product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula was super buttery and the compact made it easy to travel with. I love the idea of having all my face products in one place. I loved the natural finish and pigments.

reviews.review_title: I wish that there was a shade a bit brighter butu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by kaja. I love how compact and convenient this cream bronzer is! I can use a brush, fingers or sponge! I do think that the bronzer is a bit dark for my skin tone but I made it work. I love how easy it is to blend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a darker shade just because summer is coming and this is perfect for travelling. I love that is a cream product that blends very nice and the blush shade is really pretty. I like the highlighter shade because you can use it as a bronzer/highlighter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Kaja the Stacked Trio and I'm thoroughly impressed with the product. The packaging is incredibly convenient and easily fits in my purse and makeup bag. The formula is exceptional, as it feels like cream but applies like powder. The blush shade is also stunning and complements my skin tone perfectly. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a high-quality and versatile makeup option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Kaja the sculpting trio and just to say it all, I really liked this product. It has all the main products I need for an everyday natural look all in one compact. The colors on this trio worked very well on my skin, Im a light-light medium and I loved the way the products compliment my skin overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this combo. Compact and easy to carry while traveling. The colors are beautiful on my medium beige skin tone. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing! I love the blush and highlighter. Theyu2019re so creamy and pigmented. Iu2019ll be honest, Iu2019m not much of a bronzer girl so I donu2019t use it as much, but itu2019s super creamy and blends well too! I took it with me on travel and it didnu2019t break. Itu2019s super practical.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the lightest shade, 00 Sugar Cookie. Itu2019s unfortunately not the same as it looks in the photos, the cream contour is not as cool toned as I would have liked, and the blush shade is far peachier than expected. The best part is the highlighter, itu2019s absolutely stunning! Itu2019s a light champagne pink and gives a beautiful gleam without being glittery. Overall I really enjoy how compact and easy these bento boxes are for travel, I have both 00 and 01 and enjoy both, although I prefer 00 because the of the cooler toned shades (even though itu2019s really not as cool toned as it appears). Arm swatch starting from my wrist: contour, blush, highlighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i love the color of the blush & highlighttt. both are such a slay. i feel like the bronzer is not as pigmented as i thought it would beeee, but itu2019s not baddd! it blends super buttery

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love! Honestly this set is so freaking cute and looks so amazing. My only thing is I wish the blush were a cream. Itu2019s a really pretty color but with it being powder it doesnu2019t sit as nicely as a cream.
The blush is nice. But the bronzer is a cream and absolutely doesnu2019t show up. Wish I could return

This trio is crazy, I really love it, the contour and highlighter are perfect in my makeup, sometimes I use them just to give a little shape to my face and it's perfect!!!! And the blush I really like it too, I don't use it much but I have no complaints.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think contour was okay and blush was fine. But highlighter wasnu2019t too bright for me. Might have to get individual highlighter. I just bought this one for my travel, so I can carry it easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually donu2019t wear makeup but got this for occasional events. I love how easy it is to use. The bronzer is my favourite part, it blends really well. Blush is a bit pigmented, so you have to carefully but overall good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: all works so well, blush is very pigmented and the contour blends so well. the highlighter is perfect for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this product, I only wish that the lighter shades would have been available when I purchased it as the cool bronzer would have worked much better with my cool undertones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this trio during one of the points sales on a bit of an impulse and I'm so so happy I did! Each product is pigmented and blends so easy into the skin. The bronzer is especially easy to use, which is essential for me as I'm really not confident in my contouring skills. The blush is a lovely baby pink which gives that perfect youthful/cute glow. Honestly a total steal, you get three products for the price of 1 all in mess free/easy to use packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is not orange at all! Would be perfect for light medium to medium toned olive skin. Gave me a natural, dewy but not shimmery finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love! love! LOVE! so cute and compact, and each product is great! i love them all and all work very well on my skin. i so will be taking this on my trips and in my purse everywhere i go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great for travel and everyday looks! All the shes compliment each other and are very pigmented. Will definitely be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! Although the highlighter doesnu2019t really show, I think the contour is amazing! The blush is a perfect shade of pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for travel, complete sculpting steps from 1 purchase. However, it is quite expensive and many similar concepts are available for anyone looking for affordable alternatives. Beautiful, nonetheless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this and the bronzer is now my favourite. Wish I could buy it seperate!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the cute colors of the packaging, but most importantly the product itu2019s so smooth, it applies really well and feels amazing on your skin.

reviews.review_title: Best for on the go and travel!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I only used this for a few days but I love it so much the mirror is a bit small but since it small its easy for travel and to take around it has all the three main things you need to retouch ur making

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Its a good product. Great travel, but ngl kinda reminds me of those kid toy makeup if you know what im talking about. And each thing is pretty good but i just dont really use it.

reviews.review_title: Great for traveling or every day in your purse
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the 01 butter up if you are fair complexion this is perfect there is a little products in it but small enough to carry with you in your purse if youu2019re traveling, this is perfect. The colors are beautiful I recommend 100%. ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, it has everything I need. Itu2019s perfect for traveling or something to touch up your highlight/blush. Thereu2019s good pigment and lasts a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are AMAZING!! very convenient to take around and amazing size. I love love love this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i put lipgloss on and then used the blush. when my finger (with a tiny bit of gloss on it) touched the blush, it turned red and weird. the highlighter is a really good highlighter! the cream bronzer is really creamy but not very pigmented - I needed a lot of it for a sculpted look (full face).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Truthfully I didnu2019t think Iu2019d like it since Iu2019m a full coverage girl and expected it to be for light makeup girls. No, this is definitely pigmented! The cream bronzer surprised me the most because it looks absolutely amazing. The blush and highlighter are great too!!

reviews.review_title: Mirror fail, everything else a win!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was surprisingly pigmented on my super fair skin, but not too dark. Love the creamy formula and the blush and highlight are gorgeous.    I also had an issue with the mirror coming unglued sometime during transit and loose when I first opened the product, and glued it back in. Iu2019d love it if the company chose a better adhesive :)  Packaging is perfectly travel sized but the amount in each pan is surprisingly generous! This was an impulse grab and Iu2019m so glad I did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I initially bought this for travel but I canu2019t stop using it! All the colors are so pigmented and a little goes a long way so even though itu2019s small it will last me a long time. And for the price I will happily keep repurchasing. So happy I found this!!

reviews.review_title: A bit disappointing, but affordably priced.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first thought when I opened this product was that it was smaller than it appeared to be online. I was also quite disappointed to find the mirror was detached. I found that the highlighter was a nice natural glow; however, the blush was too sparkly. My least favourite part of the trio was the cream contour as it will be unwearable for me because itu2019s too yellow for my complexion. I appreciate the lower cost for this product and the fact itu2019s cruelty free, but overall was disappointed with the makeup itself and the detached mirror. I think improvements toward the quality of the packaging and makeup inside could really benefit this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s adorable and the bronzer is actually really pigmented and so is the highlighter n blush. Also way more convenient then carrying around 3 pallets

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! The shades are super pigmented and beautiful. The blush has a sort of highlighter in itself. Itu2019s pretty shimmery, but I still like wearing a lighter highlight on top. The bronzer is a great shade and a little goes a long way. One of my favorite bronzers and blushes. The highlighter is also great, but I prefer liquid highlight. One of the best powder highlights Iu2019ve tried so far though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's so convinent and helpful for on the go makeup!! The shades are beautiful as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a light medium warm skin tone. I just love this! I saw it for a while but kept passing it over because I have a lot of makeup. The reason I tried it now is because I need less items to carry around and want less products. The bronzer is a nice warm tone, not orange. It goes on even and natural. I was worried about the powder blush but it ended up being perfect because it actually sets my cheeks and also makes them less shiny. Its a nice blush thats not too warm or cool and its radiant but not glittery. The highlight is great too. Its natural and glowy. Maybe the only downside to consider is finishing one pan before the others.
This is absolutely amazing for traveling and perfect to just throw in ur pursue for quick check ups
travel friendly and the colours are beautiful! blends like a dream!!
Itu2019s perfect for travelling, however if I could change it, I would love a cream blush too. The shades are perfect for my skin tone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep this product in my bag throughout the day, since the size is perfect for travel. I love being able to have all 3 in an efficient space. The pigment in this trio is very nice, I especially love using the blush on top of cream products. The cream bronzer is also easy to blend out, and lasts all day. I definitely recommend this, and I will absolutely be buying more products from Kaja.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this little kit -- lovely blush and highlighter and I can use all three as eyeshadow in a pinch. Great for travel or when I want to throw a little makeup on when on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite products because itu2019s an all in one blush ,highlighter, and contour. Perfect shade and very convenient to take with you on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Returned it. Pigment pay off is negligible on brown skin. Whatever little it does give, it last at all through th day..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product, the formulation of the contour was not working for me. It was a cream that turned into a powder but didnu2019t have a very good pigmentation. Although, I do love the highlight!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product and itu2019s great for traveling! I wish the blush was cream but as long as itu2019s buildable itu2019s fine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a cream blush fanatic, I didnu2019t expect to enjoy this trio as much as I did. The powder blush and highlighter are such a soft, fine powder that it immediately blended into my skin. The cream contour added just enough warmth to my face, but I usually just use it as a cream eyeshadow (which works great, too). The highlighter isnu2019t chalrky or glittery, either. Itu2019s a very fine shimmer that gives you a natural glow look. I use it on the top of my nose to add some dimension. The blush also contains shimmer, so if that isnu2019t your think, I would skip this. Overall I highly reccomend, especially for begginers who want to get into makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfectly cute little trio! The highlighter and blush are fantastic! I bought this for travel but have been using them almost every day. In the palest shade, Butter Up, the bronzer is more like a contour, however, very pale and cool toned. It's only an OK consistency, and doesn't blend as well as others I've used. Almost wish it was a powder to match the others. Still, for the price it's a good trio to pick up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was one of the best products I have used for my work travels! Having all three of these in one compact was a great space saver and the product itself was gorgeous. I loved the vibrant color of the blush and have the products lasted on my skin all throughout my work day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With all the luggage issues at airports, Iu2019ve been trying to streamline my carryon essentials for traveling. This is the perfect little cheek trio! The cream bronzer is pigmented and blends well (I usually use the Chanel cream bronzer) and this one does just as well without the bulky packaging.

reviews.review_title: Must have for on the go!
reviews.review_text: This product was amazing having all 3 products in one! The cream bronzer was my favorite and lasted longer than any other products I have! The blush was bright and I recommend this product to anyone that can get it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I always struggle with blush, bronzer, and highlighter being scattered throughout my makeup bag so having them all in one compact is a dream! I love all three of these products - they're super blendable and creamy - and it's so nice to have them in a little case all together for travel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my opinion, and iu2019m glad i chose it! itu2019s perfect! the blush looks light at first but it POPS once applied to my brown skin. The bronzer is so good too! i love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think the trio is a pretty good product. I got the deepest shade and it actually worked for me. And itu2019s something nice and compact for travel. My favorite was the bronzer, it looks really really good. I wish the blush was cream as well, itu2019s nice but average. I donu2019t like the highlighter formula much, itu2019s usable but I wouldnu2019t buy it alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Being enjoying a no makeup look and this comes in handy really easy to blend to my skin doesnu2019t look patchy. Look super beautiful on my skin I just add gloss to my lips and Iu2019m done u2705 love it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: What an innovative and convenient product! It's so nice to have one thing with all of the essentials instead of having to carry around multiple products. All of the formulas are smooth and apply really nicely, they last me throughout the day and blend really well, too! More companies should make multi products like this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE the convenience of the Kaja Play Bento!! The Bronzer, Blush and Highlight all apply beautifully, very pigmented and long lasting. I have the Cloud Latte palate and theyu2019re the perfect shades for light/medium skin tones. Iu2019m not a huge fan of cream bronzers, but It blended seamlessly and wasnu2019t patchy at all. I love how it goes on as a cream, but dries to a powder, leaving the skin not feeling sticky at all. The color was perfect for adding subtle dimension to my face. The blush and highlight are both great. Really beautiful colors that work well with all undertones. Will be adding this one to my travel bag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I looove Kaja and am a huge fan of their eyeshadow bentos so I was excited when they launched a cheek bento. I do find itu2019s weird that the products are half powder and half cream. It would have made more sense if it was all cream or all powder. The product itself is super blendable but not super pigmented - which can be a good or bad thing depending on your preference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a 3 in 1 multi use product and this is so convenient and easy to travel with. The colors are colors and the blush is super pigmented it is my favorite out of the 3. The highlight is so nice and smooth and the bronzer is creamy canu2019t recommend enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the convenience of this product, it is on the smaller side though. I wish it would be full size products. Definitely pigmented! The blush is really pretty. The highlight is definitely a more glowy highlight. Iu2019m not the biggest fan of cream bronzers, but thatu2019s more of a personal preference! Overall pretty happy with the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the formulations of all these products, especially the blush. Iu2019ve been keeping it in my bag and itu2019s great for little touch ups throughout the day- itu2019s convenient to just grab one container for all the products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: How cute is this set? It has stacked layers of all the color palettes that I need and itu2019s super convenient. I especially love it traveling since itu2019s really light weight. I think Iu2019ll recommend to my friends as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously obsessed with the Kaja Bento Blush, Bronzer, & Highlighter trio. Each of the products applies beautifully, very pigmented and long lasting. Super convenient packaging for on - the - go mamas who do their makeup in the car like I do!

reviews.review_title: Must have for on the go
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: In looovveeee! The colors are pigmented on my brown skin. The brown is deep enough for a contour the blush shows beautifully on my cheeks. Itu2019s so compact and fits in my bag for on the go touch ups. Definitely a must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with this compact & Travel friendly trio especially after using it on vacation in jamaica! The bronzer was so pigmented that immediately I fell in love. It blended seamlessly and wasnu2019t patchy at all. The blush id live in a remote rose red/pink but it still looked amazing on my skin. Lastly the highlight, it was also beautiful on my melanated skin and gave me a great glow. Id definitely recommend this to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this trio. The cream bronzer is the perfect shade for sculpting my face while being natural. The blush is the perfect pink blush and that is saying something because I normally dislike pink blush. The highlighter is a great bronze shade with amazing pigmentation and texture as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer, highlighter, blush trio would be so nice for travel. Itu2019s so small and compact. All the shades blends out well with no problem. I do feel like the should definitely add another shade that has a deeper bronzer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with the versatility of this product and how compact it is. The bronzer is creamy and blends like no other. Blush is a natural peachy/pink color and the highlighter is amazing! I love that it saves up space in my bag when traveling. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this blush, bronzer, and highlighter trio. Each shade is the perfect shade for my skin tone and the bronzer gives me such a beautiful warmth and blended in so easily with no budge at all.  The highlighter is so beautiful and has these different colors of shimmer reflects that blend in altogether so beautifully. I highly recommend these trios and they are perfect to carry along in your purse. I loved everything about this product from the formula all the way to the compact packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is the perfect combo of blush, bronzer and highlighter. I use all of these products in my normal makeup routine so itu2019s nice to have them all stacked together ready to go. the bronzer has an amazing creamy formula that blends so well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. All 3 of the colors are so pigmented so a little goes a long way so youu2019ll definitely get your moneys worth. I also like how these colors could really fit anyones skin tones, i happen to be tanner and the colors looks phenomenal on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how convenient it was to have 3 products in one! the formula was very blendable and didn't move or disturb any foundation underneath. I love the shade of the blush! this is the most perfect product for traveling!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this whole set! Itu2019s perfect for travel since you get 3 face products packed together in one! Normally I donu2019t like sets like these because I donu2019t like all the colors, but the medium set colors compliment my undertone perfectly. The bronzer is creamy and blends like a dream, beautiful peach blush and a blinding highlight. Definitely one of my favorite formulau2019s Iu2019ve tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Living the Play Bento Cream Bronzer, Powder Blush, & Highlighter Trio by Kaja! As a busy professional, I love that it is super compact and easy to travel (fits well in my purse) with and the colors are super pigmented which goes on smoothly and stays on well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can see why these are so loved! The formula of the 3 products is amazing and blends like a dream! The shades are work SO well together too. Perfect to reach for if you wanna put no thought into your face makeup & definitely something nice for traveling!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging of this product. It has three different layers that can be used for many looks which is so cool. I really like how pigmented the blush is and how smooth and creamy the bronzer is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really love having these three all-in-one. The colors/tones compliment each other well and the component itself is easy to flip between the products easily.  Great both for traveling and to use at home, overall love the formula and packaging 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love these pocket-sized stacks of blush, highlighter, and bronzer trios Smooth and silky like butter and blends Instantly into a cream-to-powder finish. love the way these moisturizing the skin + The shades are JUST SOOOO STUNNING

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed! The quality is amazing and the packaging is so compact that I can really take this on the go. The shades of the blush contour and highlighter are extremely universal and beautiful. I definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for the make up bag!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This trio is beautiful. The colors are bright and long lasting. The Coral Crumbs blush is very pigmented, it goes so well with the Gold Drip highlighter. The bronzer in More Macchiato is the perfect shade and the best texture. I really love the packaging , so easy to take with you everywhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have wanted to try one of the Play Bento trios for so long! I finally got my hands on these bronzer, blush, and highlight trios and I am so happy with it! I used the highlight shade on my eyes last night and it was so pretty with a wing and a light falsie. The blush was sooo pigmented and pretty. I love how this takes up way less space In my makeup bag as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This little bundle is such a life saver! I loved how compact it is having the ability to have a blush, bronzer and highlighter without the bulk is genius! The colors blend beautifully and theyu2019re super rich. I travel a lot so the option to carry three in one is so helpful and gives me more space in my bag for other things or I can just pop it in my hand bag for touch ups!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this trio! The blush is a little bit sparkly which makes the whole set super glam. You can use each alone or all together, and itu2019s super convenient for packing and vacations where space may be limited. Iu2019d recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not only is this trio adorably cute, it is so flattering! Everything blends out like a dream and the bronzer is not orange at all. Gives such a healthy sunkissed glow. The highlighter isnu2019t too shimmery which is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am always looking for convenience in my beauty routine and this trio is a MUST. The stackable aspect makes carrying it my purse a breeze and the color payout it great. Definite must for a woman on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was attracted to the concept of this trio but wish they were all creams! The cream contour is amazing but Iu2019m over powders- not that theirs is bad I just donu2019t love a powder plush or highlighter finish! Should have read it more carefully

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how convenient this product is and how all the colors coordinate with one another perfectly. It is very travel friendly and perfect to bring with me to photoshoots. Very easy to blend too! I hope they come out with more shade ranges!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the ability of having this trio all together. The formula is amazing, it blends super well and sits amazing on my skin. I love how itu2019s super compact and I can just throw it in my purse and have it on the go.

reviews.review_title: The three in one idea is so genius!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product design, its so fun! I was surprised by how pigmented the product was and I also liked that I was able to apply product with my fingers. Overall I love the compact size which is great for traveling, and the creamy and blendable formula.

reviews.review_title: Blush takes the cake! Convenient and cute.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's definitely convenient to have my blush, bronzer, and highlighter in one component! The only downsides I have is that the blush is powder and the bronzer is cream, and I feel like that stresses me out, as I like to layer the placement of my blush and bronzer. I also think the bronzer is a litter too cool for my skin tone. Otherwise, this has definitely convinced me to buy Kaja blushes. They're very pigmented and pretty (and you can never have enough blush!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Small but highly pigmented! This is the perfect product to add into my makeup bag when traveling. Overall I love the shade range in the blush and highlight I just wish the contour shades were more on the cool side.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a fun product! I love how compact it is, making it perfect for travel. The formula is super creamy and blendable, and I love how the shades compliment my skin tone. Excited to add this to my makeup collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This trio is just perfect to have. Itu2019s great to keep in your purse or travel. Itu2019s easy to apply, you just need your finger! The texture is creamy and dries to a powder. Using these three together adds dimension to your face and helps to get a perfect makeup! I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Super creamy and they all blended into my skin like a dream! Very light weight and compact for traveling. I was gifted to try this product, but I will definitely purchase once I run out! Everyone should try it out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This set really took me by surprise! I have a medium deep complexion (Nars Macao) and I wasnu2019t sure how itu2019d look on me. The darkest model they used is still quite light. But let me tell you, this shade is PIGMENTED. During my first use I went in with far too much. Iu2019d recommend a light touch. And I think that people up to 3 shades darker than me will wear this beautifully as well! My favorite of the three is the blush. It has some light golden shimmer in it and the pink is super complementary for deeper skin. I like the bronzer as well, but I have to apply it lightly because it is quite dark on my complexion. The highlighter isnu2019t my favorite formula. Powder highlighters are a bit too heavy for my everyday makeup, but I know Iu2019ll get a lot of use out of this set! I also love the convenience of three products in one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how compact this is. Itu2019s easy to open and easy to use. I love that Iu2019m able to have 3 quality products so easily accessible for travel in my make up bag. I really like this product and will recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this concept, itu2019s so compact and convenient (I do my makeup at the gym in the morning and this is such a space saver). The blush is nice and has good pigment, the highlighter is a BLINDING highlight and the cream bronzer is a really nice undertone! Overall this is such a nice product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product, super versatile and it is also perfect to take on trips.  I loved it I highly recommend it I leave you a photo of a look I did with it I really love it ! and the color is really amazing for my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I use this at home, but itu2019s definitely my go-to for getting ready during car rides!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a cute product! The shades are so pretty and I love how versatile it is. Itu2019s perfect for traveling and I use it all over my face. Definitely got me interested in checking out more from this brand

reviews.review_text: Love this product so much! Itu2019s such a good size for my purse and can take it anywhere I go! The products are pigmented. The bronzer is definitely my favorite! The blush is such a pretty pink tone as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loveeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee this product, it's so good to have 3 products in one and let each one be so good and leave such a cute finish I recommend !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Itu2019s so cuteeeee

reviews.review_title: you NEED this in your makeup routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin

Overall Iu2019m a big fan of this product and love how easy it is to use and transport.
