reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the branding - bento! how cute and clever is that. As the name suggests itu2019s compact and super convenient to drop in your to-go makeup bag. The texture is nice and smooth. It never caused any irritations or redness on my combination skin. The coverage is good and it lasts!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this set! It is so beautiful and the colors are exquisite!  You can definitely customize this depending on your skin tone as it has a lot of pigment but it can also be built up! It wears beautifully!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This trio is a versatile little travel companion, I love finding ways to reduce my load when I am on the go.  The shade of the blush is a standout for me, itu2019s warm and flattering on fair skin.   I tend to use minimal bronzer, so this provides more than enough to last me for a while, the texture is really smooth and blends nicely with moisturized skin, even if I am not using a foundation, I just dab it on with my finger.  The highlighter has good pigment and I use it to give my eyes a pop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For starters, I have to say that I have never tried this brand before and I am so glad that I did!! I absolutely loved how it brought the trio all in one so I have it alll together at all times. ALSO, the quality of the products were sooooo good and looked so good on my skin!! Iu2019m more of a cream highlighter girl and I have to say I was impressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how convenient this product is! Itu2019s perfect for traveling or to throw in my purse for a touch up later. The colors are so beautiful and super easy to blend out. The pigment of each product is also wonderful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product it works so good and is so creamy and light and airy on my skin it also does not break me out and it blends perfectly, i love thag they all look natural with eachother and have a great cream consistency

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how the blush,highlighter and bronzer come in one component. Super easy to use and when youu2019re running late for work you donu2019t have to carry so much makeup in your bag. Definitely worth it. Love Kaja

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect product for someone on the go or who just wants a mid-day touch up here and there. The packaging is so cute and compact and I love being able to touch up my blush and highlighter so easily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always carry highlighter in my purse for touchups. This 3-in-1 compact is literally perfect for carrying in my purse! It's smaller than my regular highlighter AND has blush and contour attached. I'm in love with the convenient and CUTE case they come in. I was pleasantly surprised by the sweet scent of the makeup and all 3 blend extremely well either with fingers or a makeup brush. The shades are all very complimentary for each other. So happy with this compact!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the Play Bento Cream Bronzer, Powder Blush and Highlighter Sculpting Trio in the color combination  02 Cloud Latte for medium complexions. This all in one Face Palette applies so easily to my skin like creamy and dries without any creases. It takes up less space in my make up bag and simplifies my routine! I apply with my finger to get a really natural and effortless look and then it stays in place all day, even in this florida heat!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect makeup trio for travel! Itu2019s sturdy, the formulas are amazingly pigmented, and itu2019s the perfect size. I love how compact it is! The pink shade is adorable on my Asian skin tone, and the cream bronzer works well to warm the skin without looking orange. Love the natural highlight too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting a face trio for travel or just really everyday and Iu2019m so happy I found one! The blush and bronzer color looked a little intimidating at frost but one I applied it, it went on so smooth! The bronzer cream blended into my skin PERFECT! It was the perfect shade for everyday and buildable depending how strong you want the contour, highlight gave my skin the perfect glow! The blush is extremely pigmented which is a great thing but definitely dip your brush into it very lightly and build the color as desired.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Super impressed by how long this product lasts ! I love the packaging and the highlight is my fave !! Super cute I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the compact set from Kaja, doesnu2019t clutter my makeup drawer. This was my first time using a cream bronzer/blush and I am not obsessed. I was hesitant on using it because I didnu2019t want my makeup to feel too heavy, but this gave me the natural look I was trying to achieve. So beautiful and easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Itu2019s 3-in-1 and the quality is amazing! Super mom friendly especially with a newborn. I can barely do my makeup but this has helped a lot since I donu2019t have to pull out so much products. The blush is my favorite itu2019s so pigmented and nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I must say tha the product is super cute and smart. I love to have blush, bornzer and highlighter all together, its easy to carry and also, i cant forget any of them, haha. I love the formula, is super blendable cause si creamy but not grasy so its great for the summer. I recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Me encanto me dejo la piel muy bonita y se difumina perfectamente los tonos estu00e1n preciosos y muy bien pensados con las tonalidades de cada persona es Perfecto su tamau00f1o y bueno para llevar a cualquier lado y lucir glamorosa y linda siempre

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this! So easy to use, and I love the cream bronzer formula - so blendable <3  I got the dark shade because I'm really tan in the summer and I wanted more of an impact, but it was a bit too dark so I repurpose as eyeshadow and it works great. I'll pick up the med shade soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use the bronzer the most but the blush and highlighter are also very pretty and still get use. My favourite part in the adorable and convenient packaging perfect for travelling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was great it definitely helped me with my acne but at the same time kept me glowing, still a little confused about why they have bronzer lipstick and highlighter. My friend recommended this to me, and I'm glad she did. I also love how this product is safe to put on my dog's leash and not get it dirty 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE the packaging. Itu2019s very cute like mostly all of Kajau2019s products. I use the cream bronzer to sculpt my face and it works great. The blush is decently pigmented and very cute and the highlighter is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I should of got the shade darker for my summer tone but this is still soo nice. The blush pigment is beautiful. Easy to go heavy with on the first use because I wasnu2019t expecting that. I have never used a cream bronzer before so was a bit nervous but it is gorgeous and easy to apply! I love the compact container!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this little trio. Cream bronzer is super easy to use and looks very natural on the skin. The blush is the most gorgeous light pink colour u2013 itu2019s pretty pigmented though so go in with a lighter hand. Highlighter has a slight pink shift, and is glowy but not too over the top. Makes for a great inner-corner highlight as well. Packaging is very compact and perfect for travel. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best products I used. Itu2019s so practical I carry it in my bag with me wherever I go. Love the colors and the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this - great product and compact too. Perfect to travel with. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The three products themselves looked great on me. The bronzer blended well, and the highlighter gave me a nice, subtle glow. I also love the stacked design of the case. So glad I tried this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Upon opening it for the first time, the whole highlighter jumped out effortlessly. I managed to salvage it back in but I would advise opening it very cautiously. Donu2019t get me wrong, the formula and the idea of this product is amazing. I would definitely recommend, however, probably those who use light makeup due to its price and the amount of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The blush is the perfect color that blends perfectly. The highlighter adds the perfect pop and shine to my face and the bronzer is a creamy blendable compact that works great with a beauty blender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the blush it's such a pretty pink and the bronzer is creamy and has a very natural finish. The one thing I don't like is the highlighter, it's not so pigmented so I never use it but I keep buying this just cause the blush and bronzer is sooo good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly the packaging is super cute, secondly the products are SO pigmented you only need a tiny bit to go a long way! Loving the cream bronzer! (My first cream face product!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I literally use this everyday, itu2019s my go to for a cream bronzer. For context, Iu2019m a very fair redhead so finding a bronzer that isnu2019t too orange or dark can be a challenge. This is it folks! It isnu2019t too orange, blends amazingly and a little can go a long way but is buildable depending on your style of coverage. The blush is the most perfect pinched cheek pink and the highlighter is beautiful. All around, something I will continue to buy as long as it exists.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this. Each one has perfect pigment, totally buildable to match however you like your contour. This is an item I will always have in my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my dream product! I am new to using bronzer and wanted to find one before the summer started. I was having a hard time deciding then came across this that had a blush and a highlighter too and itu2019s perfect. The bronzer gives a healthy warmth to the skin, the blush adds some much needed life to my pale skin, and the highlighter is very buildable for different looks. I love that itu2019s in a small compact so it doesnu2019t take up a ton of room in my makeup box. Overall, really happy with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: bought for my mom and she loved it!! very convenient product. never been disappointed with kaja myself and they have the cutest packaging!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try these but the pigment just isnu2019t there and itu2019s too hard to blend. These were a waste of money for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! The texture is so soft, the color, the blending. You can use a tiny bit of the product for a natural look or use more for a stronger look. The fact that is tiny is perfect for traveling purpose.

reviews.review_title: 10/10 but please donu2019t tell the influencers
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The highlighter is so glowy, the blush is so pigmented, and the contour is so easy to blend. This packaging is also sooo convenient and cute!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These colors are perfectly blendable on my fair skin. I love the glowy sheen that comes off of it! I used this on top of the Armani Luminous Silk foundation (3.75- very fair, pink) and it looks very natural; which is exactly what I wanted! Thanks Sephora!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: expensive but worth it. these colours are so pretty and the packaging is very convinient.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this specifically for travel and ended up loving it! The bronzer is super creamy and the blush/highlighter are nice and subtle. Purchasing again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with this. The blush and highlight powders are just pigmented enough for a perfect everyday look, and the bronzer is so soft on my skin. And the shine of the highlight!! The colors go so well with my skin tone, theyu2019re a lot deeper in person. The packaging is fantastic too!! Itu2019s so so cute. Will update if my opinion worsens but so far this is my new favorite face product :)

Love the blush and highlighter. Itu2019s subtle but still leave a good hint of colour. The highlighter gives a very natural look if you put a little bit and itu2019s not glittery. The bronzer blends well, I have really fair skin so itu2019s little dark, but if I put it on lightly, it works great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This product is amazing. So pigmented, and it gives my whole face the perfect glow. The cream bronzer is easy to blend, and stays on for the whole day. Perfect to have in the purse for touch ups if needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product the highlight is a little too glittery for my liking but plus and bronzer are amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: literally so pretty and i love that itu2019s travel friendly and easy to use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this initially because it's so compact and clever. In the stores the colors were light. However, after applying at home with the rest of my makeup, I felt it would be more appropriate for a 16 year old.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The only reason Iu2019m not giving this 5 stars is because I was not a fan of the blush. It is too pink for my taste but the bronzer and highlight are amazing, they go on very smooth and are a beautiful color. I will probably purchase again but I hope they change the blush color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this this little bento stack, the cream bronzer is a perfect sun kissed glow colour, the blush I use everyday even if Iu2019m not wearing foundation cause itu2019s so pretty and the highlight it beautiful and subtle but can be built up, great for travelling

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really lovely colors. The blush is a easy to blend powder. The highlighter is a powder that is bit creamy. The bronzer is creamy and easy to blend, for the color, itu2019s definitely on the warmer side.Super travel friendly as well (comes with a mirror).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product, but they can be really difficult to open. Sometimes I feel like my nail is going to fall off as I try to pry it open.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love love love!!!  So easy to use and travel with!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really liked this product on me and the package is super cute and convenient for traveling. Very good shades for my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bronzer is cream based- probably my fault as I didn't read the description well enough & assumed everything was going to be powder. The blush is very pigmented so a little goes a long way & overall not too bad of a purchase. I have very fair skin & the medium complexion worked best for me. Smaller than what I was expecting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: blush is super pigmented, bronzer blends very nicely, never thought i'd like it more than my milk makeup bronzer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how compact the packaging is, it's an amazing option for travel. Highlighter gives really nice and healthy glow to the skin. Bronzer is really easy to blend and it gives a nice sun-kissed effect on the skin. However, the blush is extremely intense for fair skin! Even when I lightly tap the brush on it, it will still give me a clown look. I always have to go over blush with my beauty blender and some leftover foundation to make it look less ridiculous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product and how it is so compact. Itu2019s perfect for travel, and itu2019s so cute it looks nice on my vanity. However I really wish it was a powder bronzer. Iu2019m not opposed to the cream, it blends nice and doesnu2019t seem to react negatively with any other foundations I have. I just think keeping it all powders would have made more sense. Love the blush shade, and love the highlight shade. Wish they had more shades, and more variety for light (and medium and deep) as I would probably buy them all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: the bronzer is a nice creamy texture, and the blush is a gorgeous colour but the highlight emphasizes texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Good product, individually packed, great to have a brush not smudge to other products. Blush is sparkly, hoping for not sparkly blush. Overall good and you can keep it in your small makeup kit for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite purchase from this month, all three in one pack for only $25 is worth buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best face palettes I have tried. The packaging is nice and compact but you still get a lot of product in it. Every shade is beautiful and blendable. This trio is really nice for pale skin as the shades are just right and won't leave you looking muddy or sunburnt. It is very versatile and I find that it can be very natural or it can be built up to be super glam. This palette comes everywhere with me.

reviews.review_title: really cute and perfect for travel
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this itu2019s perfect to take with me to travel and itu2019s lasted a long time the colors are really pretty and last me all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this. The bronzer is lovely and smooth and seems to stay put pretty well. The overall look is just pretty and natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great blendable bronzer, shy highlighter(doesn't pack up, but gives a subtle more natural look) and good blush color for fair skin. I am actually pretty happy with the combo as it is small and great on the go to bring in the purse for quick touch-up. Just wished the highlighter could build up to be brighter; I tend to add Marc Jacob's coconut cream to give more of a shiny-wow factor.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product- bad packaging. I bought this exclusively for travel and it broke after one drop. I would hope it could handle a bit of jostling

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly my favorite cheek palette. I have a Mediterranean skintone that's olive, yellow, and red brown at the same time depending on the time of year so it's hard to match colors to my face. Especially blush usually ends up too chalky or undertones that clash. Every color in this palette compliments my skintone and I love that it's small and easy to fit into any purse. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Perfect compact trio for everyday use + traveling
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fair, dry skin here. This stuff is AMAZING, was wildly impressed by the pigmentation of each layer of the trio. Cream bronzer is super blendable and melts into the skin like a dream; the powder blush is such a gorgeous color, one swipe with your brush is all you need for a lot of pigment; the highlighter is fantastic, not chalky or cheap-looking. This is my first time trying Kaja's products and I'm suuuuuuper happy with this purchase, I'm in love. Now wondering if they carry a full-size version of the bronzer.   Only cons: it's in a compact case, so if you have long nails it's kind of difficult opening the bronzer layer at first. Also, it's soooooo tiny and I know I'll finish this within like two or three months but I'm so excited to stock up on these!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Kaja giftme the best trio ever! With Play Bento Cream Bronzer, Powder Blush and Highlighter Sculpting Trio I have so much fun doing my makeup and also it is super easy to apply just with your fingers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this but I donu2019t understand why it gets such high ratings. The cream bronzer is really nice and very blendable and the highlighter is okay which is why itu2019s getting 3 stars instead of 1 or 2. The blush is super pigmented, which at first is nice but then literally disappears within an hour! I would not buy this or recommend it for that reason. I will be returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in LOVE with the packaging and the size, such a well-executed idea! just the basics, and so easy to apply with fingers or a brush, even as someone who doesn't wear much makeup. I'm also happy there's not too much fallout on the powders, and good pigment on my fair-light skin! my only issues are that I wish the blush didn't have glitter, and the highlighter was more shimmery rather than sparkly. that's a personal preference, since I like a more subtle look. and I think that could make it less wearable on older skin. but I'll probably still use this a lot, and I would recommend it to anyone who wants a cute, travel-ready compact set. it would also be a nice gift for someone new to makeup. overall I'm impressed!

reviews.review_title: Great for light make up days!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for a light make up day! I love that itu2019s nice and compact so I can throw it in my purse if I need a touch up. The products are pigmented and blendable  making it very easy to apply quickly. Iu2019ve only used this on light make up days so Iu2019m not sure how great this would be for events but I can tell you thatu2019s itu2019s very convenient and effective for everyday make up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love!! Such a great product. Love how I can take this on the go so easily. Iu2019m fair to medium skin color and these colors work great! Prob more for a more natural look, but seems buildable if you want more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super cute ! Got it as a birthday gift. I love how it is travel and finger friendly. The blush is extremely pigmented and the highlighter is so pretty and glowy. Not sure how I feel about the cream contour at the bottom when the top two tiers are powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I spotted this while I was at the Sephora store and getting ready to check out, and as I love the Bento eyeshadow trios I figured I would like this too. Nope. I love this!  I canu2019t believe how great this little trio is!  I have light-medium skin and got 01, and it works perfect. The cream bronzer is an excellent formula and the shade is perfect for me, the blush is beautiful, and so is the highlight. This is just a great product that Iu2019ll use every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love this trio. Itu2019s so easy to use and blends into my skin perfectly. And itu2019s your best friend if you are traveling. My most fav is the highlighter, itu2019s gives  a nice glow to the skin. I will definitely buy this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Kaja products and this face bento is no exception! My biggest complaint is that I wish the products were all cream, not just the bronzer. I feel like itu2019s a weird combination by mixing powders and creams. However, the products perform very well and look beautiful on my fair complexion. Overall, I would recommend this product as it does not move foundation and it blends beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect product to carry around if you want to have makeup on you without carrying large products. I love having a blush, bronzer, and highlighter in one component it is very easy to carry. I also love how the bronzer is super creamy and bendable product. But I do wish the blush was also creamy texture. Overall, I love this and would recommend to everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally the best product Iu2019ve ever had for on the go. I love having a blush, highlight and contour all in one lil compact. The formula is solid too. Honestly all around a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this compact! Itu2019s awesome for everyday and also for travel. All of the products are such high quality and perform amazingly, and last so long on the skin. I would highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This may be my new favorite beauty travel product! It has everything I need to sculpt my face when away from home. Everything in this little compact is blendable and gorgeous. I can even manage without a brush if necessary. The shades are pigmented so a little goes a long ways. They also build up beautifully but look naturally stunning with just a basic application. I may just start carrying it in my purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. Itu2019s small, cute, & convenient!  I love how you have all 3 in 1 compact. This product is perfect for travel.  Absolutely obsessed with the Kaia beauty play bento blush, highlighter, and cream bronzer trio!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product for many reasons! Itu2019s small, cute, & convenient! The shade are really nice & I enjoy the texture of the products and how itu2019s formulated. It adds the perfect amount of color for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this face complexion trio!! The shades are super nice and blend so nicely. The formula is buttery smooth  and really nice formulated! The highlighter is definitely the best out of the trio and is super pigmented!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. Small, compact, and packing is cute. Would definitely recommend this product to everyone. Although, everyone should know that the bronzer is cream while the rest of the products are powders, so just keep that in mind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! The packaging is so convenient and I love how you have all 3 in 1 compact. The formula is great, I love how itu2019s a powder blush and highlighter but a cream bronzer. Highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite part about this product is that it is easy to fit in your purse for nights out! Touch ups are easy. And there is no risk of each individual product getting lost in your bag because they are connected. The product goes smoothly on my skin when applied. It has good color and stayed on decently.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is great for all those that like a simple and fresh look/everyday wear! Super natural and would be great for travel! The compact case and blendable finish make it great for blush/highlighter and eyeshadow on the go. Definitely a cute gift idea too for stocking stuffers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was insanely convenient. I took this on my honeymoon and it took up virtually no space at all - my makeup bag looked so empty! The cream bronzer is stunning. A beautiful shade, great blendability. I will be taking this on future trips for sure. The blush is nice, I prefer a more peachy tone but thatu2019s personal preference. Both the blush and highlight are very glittery. I would prefer more of a satin sheen rather than glitter, but they do look nice on. The highlight doubles as an inner corner highlight! The cream bronzer is the real star here though. The price is very reasonable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Kaja trio compact is really pretty on my light skin complexion. The cream bronzer blended effortlessly and really warmed up my face. The powder blush and. Highlight are pretty as well. This product is perfect for travel or daily touch ups on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am seriously obsessed with all Kaja products so I couldnu2019t wait to test this one out! I absolutely love the highlighter and blush. They are super creamy and blend-able. I was a little thrown off by the bronzer being a different texture than the other two, but it worked fine for me! Overall I really enjoyed this and can totally see myself packing this when traveling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super cute and portable package that is super easy to just have in your purse or when traveling. I liked all the components, but the bronzer specially. Itu2019s a beautiful neutral shade for light complexions and it blended like a dream. The highlighter had a soft but noticeable finish. The blush gave me a few issues with blending, but looked nice when topped with the highlighter for an added oomph! Good value and easy to travel with!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these little compact sets from Kaja! Not only are they super convenient and compact but they are truly so beautiful! I especially love the blush itu2019s the perfect shade for my fair skin. Iu2019m obsessed! Product gifted from Kaja but thoughts are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this trio! The packaging is compact and perfect for travel. The poster blush is pigmented and blends well! The highlighter and bronzer are awesome as well! Everything blended nicely and itu2019s a quick 1-2-3 step to get a natural makeup look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed! Perfect for traveling and such flattering shades to keep you snatched on the go. Will definitely be the newest travel go to. Cream Bronzer is perfect for contour as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is pigmented enough to give you the full beat without overdoing it to the point it can't blend! This trio is super practical and to just throw into your purse or to travel with. One of my faves from Kaja definitely !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely obsessed with the Kaia beauty play bento blush, highlighter, and cream bronzer trio! I a have fair skin and it can be hard to find the right colors in pallets but this is the perfect travel companion this holiday season to stay snatched on the go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is so stinking cute and I absolutely love the way it performs . I think the blush and highlight are my favorites in this trio.The cream bronzer is a very nice formula however the color was a bit on the orange side. I still like it but itu2019s a little warm for my taste. All in all itu2019s a great little trio that would be perfect for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was free by kaja.I love the packaging it makes it so easy to travel with it. I went in a trip and this is what I took 3 in 1. The bronzer is so creamy it blends so easy and the blush is the perfect pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love these shades in this trio! From the highlighter, blush, to the bronzer.. they're the smoothest and silkiest shades! Love the way they apply and blend on my skin. It's also so easy to travel with since it's 3 of my essentials!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this little compact! First off the blush is the perfect shade of pink and looks good with literally every makeup look. The highlighter is the perfect pigmentation to give you a natural looking glow and the bronzer blends super smooth. Great addition to my every day makeup routine!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin tone is fair/light, and I received the Play Bento in the color 01 Butter Up. It has a coral-pink powder blush, a champagne powder highlighter, and a warm brown cream bronzer. The blush is beautiful, very pigmented, and blends easily. The highlighter is pretty but more on the subtle side (more glow from within rather than blinding). The bronzer is pigmented and blended really easily, but is a little more warm than I normally like. I also prefer powder bronzers over creams. All 3 face products can be applied with your fingers or brushes, and I actually use a sponge to apply the bronzer. Overall I really like this trio and think itu2019s really nice for travel, on the go, or every day makeup looks. The price is fair considering you get 3 separate products, and I think itu2019ll last quite a while. Also, kaja products have such cute packaging!I would recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is a new fav! i travel a lot and love having blush, bronzer and highlighter all in one compact to throw in my bag for on the go. the three colors look beautiful together and the formulas are creamy & blend super well. in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I am a nurse whou2019s always getting rest fast in the morning so all in one products like these are a game changer! The blush is soooo pretty and natural! Stays put all day and doesnu2019t irritate my sensitive acne prone skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very hopeful for this and was not disappointed. The cream bronzer is my favorite for everyday wear and is so beautiful built up for night time. You can contour, blush, and natural highlight all in one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the convenience and compact packaging of this 3-in-1 product. The shades are natural and look very flattering on. The bronzer provides the perfect bit of warmth to the skin and the highlighter gives a healthy glow. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is 10/10 for me. The formula of this product is insane so creamy and blends in like a dream and the whole idea of this product is amazing because it makes life so much easier when traveling you no longer have to take so many products with you when you have this all in one! This is definitely a must and I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, I really love this trio! Itu2019s super handy to have all three things u2014 blush, bronzer and highlighter u2014 in one place. Itu2019s absolutely perfect for traveling. I love all the shades, and Iu2019m almost sure they will fit almost all skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so easy to use and perfect for traveling. I love the way it makes my complexion look. It adds the perfect amount of color to my face especially since Iu2019m on the paler side. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Bento Blendable Sculpting Trio is perfect for everyday makeup especially if you travel a lot because you get all this blush, bronzer and highlighter in one small compact. The pigment is really good, creamy and easy to blend. I got the Butter Up 01 formula and it's perfect for a natural look. I like everything about this Bento makeup. I'm hoping they add a powder bronzer in this compact soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these shades and these formulas! They blend so nicely and the shades look nice on my skin tone. The bronzer is flattering- not orange and not ashy. I love how convenient this trio is since all three products are together.

reviews.review_title: This trio works well and lasted the whole day!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a great product. The packaging is so cute.   It will be great when I travel. Itu2019s perfect for a natural fresh look. The blush and the highlighter are nicely pigmented and they  blend amazingly!  Iu2019d like it even more if the bronzer had been a powder as well. This trio works well and lasted the whole day, even though Iu2019ve combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Save so much room in my mack-up bag when I'm on the go because it doesn't require brushes and can be easily applied with the fingers. I love the combination of the colors and happy it's all in one pallet!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cute little packaging! Itu2019s nice to have a 3 in one and only have to carry one item. The shades are awesome and I absolutely love the highlighter. Iu2019m so glad I got this product. I highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The option of being able to have my three essential products in my daily makeup, in a single package is the best of all!  In addition, its packaging is very comfortable and beautiful, I can carry it in my wallet without taking up so much space.  The blush is a very soft pink, it looks excellent with my skin tone (I am light -Medium) the illuminator is powerful and I would even use it as an eyeshadow, the Bronzer formula seemed very good, it blends effortlessly and the tone warm I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super cute and travel friendly! I was actually surprised by how small it was, but it beats taking a bulkier palette when you're on-the-go or traveling. Hope to see more shades come out. The bronzer, highlight and blush are ideal for light-light medium skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product by Kaja, but I want to say that it did not influence my opinion whatsoever. I like this - except the highlighter. The bronzer is a perfect shade, blush - my god, itu2019s perfect blushy tone for light-medium skin tone. The highlighter, however, did not work on my skin.  It emphasized texture and was just sitting on top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how compact and small the packaging is so it takes up less space on your makeup bag and itu2019s like a 3 in 1! Love the blush and highlight  but not a fan of creamy bronzer so Iu2019m not going to use that one often

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: In theory, this is a great, all-in-one, travel-friendly product. In practice, that function is only useful if you love all three products and because this comes in only one set per depth, I think for most people there will be at least one product they don't love. For me, the cream bronzer is quite nice; it blends well and the color is workable for me, though it leans a tad warm perhaps. The blush is okay, but not unique from any other pink blush you may have. My real disappointment was the highlight - strangely peach/pink undertoned and an overly metallic formula that really emphasized my texture. I think if you got the chance to test these before buying then maybe it would be worth it since is it quite convenient, but I don't think this will be a 3/3 hit for most.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t get over how cute the packaging for this product is! It is very small and fits well in my bag so it is super easy to touch up. The formula makes it easy to apply, and gives off a very natural look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with the packaging! It has a powder highlighter, powder blush, and cream bronzer. All of these makes my makeup look so natural, I love using it on a daily base. I have been using it ever since I got it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this set! Itu2019s super convenient to have blush, highlighter and contour all in one. The formula is super blendable and the colors are perfect. I love that thereu2019s a little mirror too for on the go touch ups!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the compact nature of this product as well as the ease of use. It's perfect for travel as well or for on-the-go touch ups throughout the day. The bronzer is super creamy and blendable and I love the pop of blush color and highlight that this trio offers. Definitely a must!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bronzer wasnu2019t best for my skin tone, more for lighter skin tones. Im not into the cream bronzer but the blush and most definitely the highlight was amazing. I will definitely be using it on my next makeup look!

reviews.review_title: Very convenient to use! Has natural shade!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was absolutely LOVE! I really like the cute convenient packaging at home or when traveling. I like that contour is in cream form (very easy to apply) but the highlighter is powder. Blush color is very natural as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I seriously love that this product was a trio. Extremely convenient! The blush & highlighter was my absolute favorite, very complimentary to my skin-tone. However, the cream bronzer ended up being too light for me, wish i had gotten the trio for a darker skin tone... But it would be perfect for someone with very fair skin. Love the formula though, that was great. Blended very well. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice to travel with.  Highlighter is bomb.  So glowy and no glitter.  Blush has small glitters in it but once blended on the face, you canu2019t see it.  Cream bronzer is super easy to blend and itu2019s not too orange.  Just the right amount of bronzer coverage for me.  Overall, this bento box awesome, however, it can be a little hard to open at times.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cheek palette. Itu2019s really compact to take with you for touch ups. The colors blend beautifully on my skin. The formula is lightweight it doesnu2019t feel heavy and itu2019s buildable color. Itu2019s definitely a keeper for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant because of all the hype around this product but I have to say I am in love! The bronzer is super creamy and blends easily and the blush and highlight are pigments and super easy to work with. I love the packaging too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this trip! The bronzer is SUCH a great texture, and I love how smoothly it blends. The trio is easy to travel with and just is so conviennent. I ran out of the bronzer really fast which is annoying but love it anyway!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the cutest! I love how easy it is to travel with and it takes up much less space than all three product it has in it. I donu2019t need to pack my bronzer, ugh lighter and brush individually so itu2019s easier to stay organized!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Most bronzers look orange on me. But this cream bronzer is just perfect shade for me. So creamy, smooth and easy to blend. Beautiful color of blush and highlighter.   What I love most about it, that they all come together in one compact packing. Now I can take my 3 products anywhere without any space issues. Best packaging, great formula and beautiful colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this! As someone who is just venturing into the world of contour and blush, I find that this was a nice light shade to begin with and a really easy formula to get right. I also love how compact it is! Gifted but all thoughts my own

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far I really like this product. The packaging is super convenient and cute, and I love that it includes a mirror. I used the highlighter for my Halloween makeup and I loved the way it looked. The only thing I would change is that I wish it came with an applicator.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All 3 shades are so creamy and easy to blend! The bronzer is buttery and looked great even though most are too dark for my pale skin. Just a touch of it blended very well into a lighter shade that was more suitable for a less-noticeable contour, which I loved! The blush was the same: extremely pigmented, goes on bright, but blends very easily into the intensity you prefer.   The highlighter is fantastic as well, so bright!  Iu2019m really loving this palette. Itu2019s so portable, easy to use and the pigments are sooo good. I think this will be a permanent staple of my makeup bag, as well as the kaja eyeshadow bento trios.  Love this design, itu2019s so fun to close them shut- and love even more how good the makeup itself is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this trio! Love that everything I need is in one compact. Definitely a big space saver since I like to take my makeup on the go with me. The blush is beautiful and long lasting. I truly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This three in one blush cream bronzer and highlight is EVERYTHING OF THE SORT! It is so small and compact! My favorite out of the three would have to be the blush! It gives you a nice glowy and natural look! I 10/10 recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this trio, the colors are just perfect, the application is great as well, most of all I am obsessed with powder blush, the glow is just amazing. Love the packaging, very convenient to carry it with you any time and it has a mirror too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have this blush combo in Color 01 (Butter Up) and it suits my skin fairly well! For reference, I am a 185 in the Fenty pro filter foundation and the blush comes up on my skin as a light pink. The highlighter is definitely on the softer side in terms of brilliance and is good for everyday wear. I have layered it under some of my stronger highlighters and it gives a nice and healthy glow look. The bronzer was surprisingly good on my skin, I typically find that bronzers come up a little too orange on my skin (yellow-neutral undertones) but this looks pretty natural. Would recommend to those with a similar skin tone to me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS SO MUCH! I love how compact & easy to use it is. I have pretty fair skin and the cream bronzer is still a bit too warm, but itu2019s not the end of the world. It blends out like a dream. The blush is pigmented and smooth & the highlight makes me look like iu2019m glowing from within. The powders to have some kick up but thatu2019s not a make or break issue for me. Love this!! Wanna try out more of this brand now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this trio!!  The blush gives such a pretty flush and the highlighter is so much more pigmented than I expected! I use this trio everyday since I got it! I canu2019t wait to try out more products soon, Iu2019m in love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This 3 in 1 is so convenient especially for traveling! I love the super creamy but still lightweight formula. It saves me space in my makeup bag but still does everything I need to create the perfect everyday look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer, highlighter and blush trio is SO cute. The packaging is so convenient for travel. The shades are perfect for my light/medium skin tone and the products are super pigmented. Theyu2019re super easy to apply and long lasting. Iu2019d definitely recommend this product to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bento format is so convenient. It combines three products in one and makes my makeup drawer so much easier to sort through. I like that they have multiple different shade options and the formula is perfect and blendable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am new to the brand Kaja but am already completely obsessed! The bronzer gives the most buttery beautiful contour shade and stays all day. I love the compact as you have all 3 shades in one and itu2019s perfect for travel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This compact set is perfect if you are looking for beautiful natural looking makeup. I have light skin and got the Butter Up shade. The bronzer is creamy and buildable. Also very easy to blend. The highlighter is very subtle and it gives the skin the perfect glow. The blush color is very light and blends beautifully almost like a creamy formula even though is powder! I love how cute and small the packing is which is perfect to bring with me on my bag for touch ups!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product came very quick!! I have used it for a week or two and do really enjoy this product! The bronzer is very creamy not super pigmented and is very cool toned. The blush and highlight are both pressed powder and have good pigment! I would recommend this product for anyone who travels a lot or doesnu2019t like to keep a lot of product on them because it is so compact!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i absolutely loveeee this product so much! The design is perfect and compact so i can take it anywhere! it also blends in with my skin so well and is easily buildable! i have a light to medium skin tone but i think it would look great on any skin tone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think Kaja beauty always make prettiest products ever. It has a Blush, highlighter and a bronzer(cream to powder formula) in one little pocket sized palette.  It blends like butter. It has a beautiful pigmentation. It's definitely worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is 1. SO ADORABLE and 2. ACTUALLY SO NICE!!! I really wish all three products were creams, but was pleasantly surprised to find the formulas of both the cream and the powders to be excellent. The packaging is so convenient for travel and the shades were perfect for my fair skin. Loved it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE this product so much! The cream bronzer looks so natural and it is so easy to blend. Love the peach shade of blush, it builds up beautifully on top of the cream bronzer and the highlighter is just the perfect addition to the trio. Love all three colors together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! The compact design makes it super easy to travel with and keeps my makeup collection very minimal. I love the formula and the shades are perfect for a variety of skin tones. I would definitely recommend trying it out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for a review. I really love Kaja products and I can definitely say that they did it again. I love the concept behind the packaging and itu2019s easy to carry around for traveling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product!! The packaging is super cute and I love that it is travel friendly!! The shades are so beautiful and very easy to blend into the skin! Perfect for touch ups on the go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a fun product from kaja! Your whole face routine in one!! Kaja has the most fun products and this is no exception. Great for saving space when youu2019re traveling! Absolutely love this palette!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this convenient, compact and cute packaging. The bronzer is my favorite and the shades are perfect for my pale skin. I wish there were more shades available for different skin tones. To add the packaging is very travel friendly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I mean, could this product be any more travel friendly? It has all your blushing, contouring, and highlighting needs in 1! The shades are beautiful and blend into the skin so easily. I've purchased the eyeshadow bento myself and to think I only need to pack 2 items for practically a full face of makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Kaja bento has the cutest packaging!  I love the concept of this beauty bento. It has blush, highlighter, and bronzer in one which makes busy mornings get ready faster, and using it while traveling is super easy! The shades are perfect for natural makeup and apply well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed with this packaging. I can easily pack this in my work bag and use it if I need any touch ups.  I love the colors. They blend out so nicely and look amazing with my skin tone! I would recommend getting this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very pretty 3 in one product. The bronzer blends pretty although it is a little light for me. I will try a darker shade. The bronzer is my least favorite - this drags over skin and doesnu2019t apply evenly. I donu2019t think any of the formulas are super pigmented, but the bronzer was the worst. Overall, this is absolutely adorable packaging, and the highlighter thatu2019s great for travel and the blush/highlighter are SO pretty. This is a really cute concept and I would be willing to try other things from this brand now!

The cream bronzer is the perfect shade where itu2019s not too warm or too cool toned, suits my skin perfect and also blends well, it doesnu2019t blend away or looks muddy. I like to apply a couple of layers (or more) for a more intense look, or a light layer for a barely there, no-makeup makeup look. I have never tried Korean makeup and I am very pleased with this trio. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

But it's very powdery, so make sure you remove the extra blush with your brush before applying this, otherwise, it looks very pigmented. Apart it blends nicely and looks very pretty. Highlighter - I love this highlighter, it gives a beautiful subtle glow. You can carry both in the daytime and nighttime. Easy to build and blend.  Overall - I am impressed with this Trio! The texture is buttery soft, blends easily, and looks beautiful on the skin. It's also super convenient to carry, perfect for traveling and comes in a cute little mirror. Bronzer and Highlighter are my top favorite, blush is pretty too, just a little powdery. Now I need to try more products from this lovely brand. Love it!

It would be beautiful on the cheeks and looks natural because it's not glittery or chunky.  I wish I got a darker shade because I got the lightest one but I'm a fan overall!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

The case is also super sturdy which is something that I canu2019t say for a lot of my make up products making me really trust this product for travel. I love the super creamy and blendable formula! Also its 3 products for $25 so thats less then $10 for each section - great price! Its a yes from me! :)

If I had to pick one makeup product to always have with me it would absolutely be the Play Bento trio, it is absolutely perfect for travel and on the go with its sleek, modern, aestheticly pleasing, and compact design. It makes it so easy to keep my makeup bag organized all the time but especially for travel and not having to worry about lugging around three bulky products and instead having a perfect compact product that has all three in one! Obsessed would be an understatement I will be repurchasing this product for years to come!

I was impressed with the formulas as well, the bronzer is blendable and the blush/ highlighter is not too powdery.  Another one of my favorite parts is how compact and lightweight this trio is. It makes it very convenient to travel with and will definitely be in my makeup bag on the go.

reviews.review_title: Perfect to throw in your makeup bag!!

reviews.review_text: I received this product complementary from Kaja. I would say 2/3 were hits!   To break it down: BLUSH- a basic warm pink shade, has some kickback but applies nicely on the cheeks. HIGHLIGHT- my least favorite of the three.. underwhelming sheen while still being kind of glittery and personally too icy. BRONZER- creamy formula that pulls a neutral-warm tone on my skin, no patchiness. My only gripe is that the small pan size makes it difficult to pick up product with my usual bronzer brush.   Great for travel purposes, and even comes with a small mirror though I donu2019t see myself using it too much. Overall a cute and convenient concept! :)
