reviews.review_text: Great combo! Absolutely love the color payout! New daily go to the packaging is convenient and perfect for my collection I was in the market for a new bronzer and found a great blush and highlighter too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve loved Kaja beauty products for a long time now! From their skincare to their makeup all the products are fantastic and made with high quality ingredients! Their eyeshadows are extremely wearable and super pigmented! There isnu2019t any fallout and they last all day!

reviews.review_title: I wish they were all creams, but thatu2019s OK! :)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this trio so much. I have been doing my makeup a lot on the go and I can only fit so many makeup items in my to-go makeup bag. I love how compact and put together this trio is! My only quarrel with it is that I wish they were all creams. I find it a little difficult applying the powered blush with my fingers. Regardless I still love the compact and I am going to be using this everyday! It is beautifully pigmented and easy to blend. If youu2019re someone whou2019s on the go like me this is a must!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Kaja beauty has a new bento box! I love that they made face ones in the style of their eyeshadow ones. Itu2019s super compact and convenient. I wish they let you interchange the colors in the palette but over its very nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this so much! The colors are beautiful and so pigmented. I love that itu2019s versatile for everyday wear. The packaging is really convenient, which is a big plus for me! Iu2019d definitely get other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This set is so freaking cute. I love taking this with me when I go out. It makes touching up my makeup so easy. Itu2019s really easily to apply and it blend into my skin well. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: kaja is an amazing brand I absolutely love their packaging whether its a face product or an eye product they are so innovative and trendy. I absolutely love this compact. Perfect for traveling it has a bronzer,  a highlighter and a beautiful true pink blush. Everything is great quality the formula of the blush is so pigmented and creamy ,the highlighter is si beautiful I'm not exaggerating. This has everything you need it's a must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried Kaja but Iu2019ve always wanted to! So I was very excited to receive this in exchange for a review. First, the packagingu2026I mean Iu2019m all for anything on the go and easy. It reminds me of Neapolitan ice cream lol, throwback to my 90u2019s childhood! Love the bronzer, great shade and blends well. Iu2019m a huge fan of blushes so this pinky shade is up my alley. Great product.Hope to try more from the brand soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a cute bronzer, blush and highlighter set! Kaja Beauty seriously has the cutest packaging and this set is cute but the quality is great as well.  Itu2019s convenient to take with my when I travel and to just keep it in my makeup bag since itu2019s compact and not bulky. My favorite is the bronzer! It looks really natural and blends really easily. It gives me a sun-kissed look and a healthy glow without being orange. The blush and highlighter are really pretty as well and I can see myself reaching for this a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this trio! It is so convenient to have a bronzer, blush and highlighter all together in a stack. Sometimes I am not sure what to look for in my makeup stash but this keeps it simple for me. Also the pigmentations are on point!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this product so much!! Itu2019s convenient to store and bring on trips because thereu2019s three products in one. I wish it was a little darker as my skin tone is fairly tan but next time I will just get another color. Absolutely loving this so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product because it was so convenient! This is great for traveling because I get my bronzer, highlight, and blush all in one! The bronzer was extremely easy to blend and did not leave my face looking orange. The highlighter was stunning!! The blush was perfect!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these bento products from Kaja. I didn't realize it had a cream bronzer until I opened it all the way. It is a decent size and perfect for on the go. These are perfect if you like quick and easy makeup without taking up too much room in your vanity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow this is a cool product it is so convenient it is travel size and its pigments pay off . THE BRONZER IS AMAZING!  A little goes a long way and the blush is so pretty it goes great on my skintone so does the highlight its so beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So disappointed in myself that I didnu2019t get this earlier! Itu2019s so compact and travel friendly! I have medium skin tone and omg the blush is so beautiful the bronzer blends like a dream! And the highlight blends so nicely. Iu2019m not saying you need this but you definitely need this ! Lol you wonu2019t be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Soft glam natural beauty doesnu2019t look cakey or blend unnaturally, never leaves texture. Works great! It really settles in perfectly. The glow is blindinnggg. You can see it from miles when I'm in the sun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product so much! Such great pigment and texture. I love how creamy and vibrant, yet subtle the colors are. I definitely recommend this product. Love that it folds in a way that I can take it with me when I travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product! I already had a cream bronzer from MILK but Iu2019m opting it out for this! It is sooo creamy and insanely easy to blend. You donu2019t need much since it is pigmented. I got the cloud latte and Iu2019m more cool toned than warm and this was perfect.   The blush is also pigmented, itu2019s very pink but you donu2019t need much!   The highlighter is not as pigmented but I honestly wanted it like that. Itu2019s a subtle highlight but it goes well with my skin tone!

reviews.review_title: MAKE THE CONTOUR A SEPARATE PRODUCT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally bought this because I was gonna be traveling and figured it would be convenient but wow this is better than I ever anticipated. I have used this every day since I got it. I have gone through the cream bronzer completely and Iu2019m hoping they make it a separate product on its own. Itu2019s a dream. Super creamy and blendable. Not too orange or ashy, just right. Doesnu2019t break me out either. The blush is my second favorite. Super soft and blendable. I also find itu2019s one of my longer lasting blushes in my collection next to the tarte Amazonian blushes. The shade is also so beautiful. The highlighter is alright. If you have texture you probably wonu2019t like it. I always make sure to set my face after applying it with a brush so it looks smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this on a whim knowing the brand was usually pretty good. Everything in the three pack was excellent. While the blush was a bit pinkies than I normally go for, it blended really well into the face. The cream bronzer was probably my favorite part of the mini and blended like a dream. The highlighter is the only part I could find a small fault in. While it looked very natural and lovely on the skin, it did still contain glitter particles which I wouldnu2019t recommend for more mature skin types. Overall, Iu2019m very impressed with this pocket face palette, and I hope to see more creative compacts from Kaja in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it!! Please make more stuff like this. Dividing each pan to offer more shades is the only improvement I can think of. Great product:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this. I reach for this cream bronzer over my Patrick Ta. The blush is a good color and formula for me too. The highlight is a bit more subtle than I usually prefer, but itu2019s workable

reviews.review_title: Blush, highlighter, and bronzer all beautiful!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in Butter Up, the lightest shade, even though Iu2019m more medium than light. Itu2019s perfect for that no makeup makeup look. The blush is sheer and natural, and the highlighter is subtle, not sparkly. I was nervous the bronzer would disappear on my skin, but nope. Itu2019s visible, buildable and blendable. I have a preference for cream contour products to begin with, which is why I bought this set. Although I have oily skin, I havenu2019t noticed the bronzer rubbing off. I suspect itu2019s a cream-to-powder formula. The bronzer did not work as an eyeshadow, in case youu2019re wondering. Giving this product five stars because all the shades are useful and compact enough for travel. Plus, the packaging is just adorable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this for its easiness of three in one (and because Iu2019ll be traveling soon) and it does not disappoint! I also love Kajau2019s prices! Very reasonable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good product for traveling. Itu2019s 3 in one. The blush is very pigmented so apply just a bit and build. The highlighter is amazing! Both of those are powders. The contour is a cream. I donu2019t usually wear foundation on a daily basis so I found it hard to blend and it was sticky. HOWEVER, I started to prime my face, and it made it much easier. I have fair/medium skin and the contour looked very natural. If youu2019re looking for something dramatic, this isnu2019t it. Korean makeup is generally made to have a more natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for the intentions of traveling with it because of its size. Iu2019ve gotten along really well with their Orange Blossom trio, so I was very excited when I found this. The bronzer is cream and itu2019s very blendable. It doesnu2019t disappear and it set on my combo skin well. The highlight was a thin formula on the skin. It looks very impactful in the pan but once I buffed it on the cheeks, I thought it disappeared. Once I moved my face in the light, that was when I saw the wet effect it gives. It is a sheer formula, so I didnu2019t see a metallic streak in low light. The blush is powdery and also a thin formula. It is pigmented, which Iu2019ll find difficult when traveling because if I were to go too hard I might mess up my face make up. On the other hand, it did last on my combo skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this trio but it didnu2019t work for me. The blush is a basic warm pink with glitter, luckily the glitter doesnu2019t translate onto the cheeks. The highlight is slightly pink toned, very subtle and felt chalky and dry. I like my highlights more creamy and pigmented. The bronzer had a nice creamy consistency but it pulled orange on my fair skin. Overall I love the idea of a trio, but the shades were all wrong for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed with this little trio. Each product is so good and I love how compact it is. The highlighter is so pretty and glowy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved the blush - great consistency and the color payoff is nice. I had no issues with blending it. I enjoyed the highlighter too as itu2019s subtle and gives a great glow. I was extremely disappointed with the bronzer. Iu2019ve got a medium skin tone and it just disappears! Iu2019ve tried using a brush and a sponge and struggled with both trying to get it to show up on my face. I was so sad because it swatched great on my hand. I would repurchase their blush and highlighter and skip the bronzer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the bronzer and blush. The highlighter wasnu2019t my favorite as I prefer a blinding highlighter and this is more subtle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice Trio of bronzer, blush, highlight. The bronzer is the same tone as the Chantecaille cream bronzer, blends amazingly. Blush is nice and highlight is appropriate for light tone skin.  Can wear on face and eyes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! The bronzer being cream makes it melt into the skin making it look seamless. It blends super nicely and easily using a brush. The blush is sparkly but itu2019s super pretty universal color. The highlight is super pretty. Iu2019d go for this shade range if you are on the tanned side. It makes you looked sun kissed. Iu2019m not sure why some people have written bad reviews... I really am enjoying this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! Even though I have oily skin, I am still able to use this product with a powder bronzer on top. I just use my fingers and it blends out really smoothly. I am MAC NC50, and this shade works for me so itu2019s not the darkest. As far as the blush, I love it it doesnu2019t break me out! The highlighter is not the right shade for me (too dark/bronzy), so I bought the 02 one and that one works better for me :) Kaja is my favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Yeah no this wonu2019t even show up on my skin tone. The bronzer is bad in it.  The blush and highlight are not that great either.   My first purchase from Kaja and my last!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is adorable, sturdy, and compact. It also has a mirror which was a pleasant surprise. The products themselves are strange. The color payoff of the blush & highlighter on both the brush and face is initially great, but after an hour of bumming around, it has disappeared. The bronzer being cream is odd, and it just blends into my medium olive/neutral skin tone. I also don't like how sparkly the blush is. I was hoping for a holy grail compact face product, but this is not it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The model representing the deepest shade on the website isn't very dark, so I wasn't sure if this would work for me, but it absolutely does! The creamy bronzer blends well and sculpts my face. The blush is pigmented. The highlighter is subtle, but can be layered a bit for more intensity. I love that it's shimmery but not glittery.  I think it's a bit odd to pair the cream bronzer with a powder blush and powder highlighter. I wish the blush was at least cream as well, but I'm overall very happy with this purchase and when I can finally travel again, this will be perfect for that. The trio is compact but still hold a decent amount of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I sampled this in-store because I was interested in buying it and I was really blown away with how bad the color selection for the bronzer is. 02 has a very warm, light orange or caramel colored cast and the step down to 03 is so much darker, itu2019s very very dark brown, so I feel like this product is only good for people with either very light skin tones or very dark skin tones with warm undertones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this one in the spring sale and I am so happy with it, the blush is so pretty and everything in general, the packaging super practical and cute. The quality of the product is very good. Really, great product and price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this trio!! The cream bronzer & the highlighter are super buttery, pigmented, and blendable. I would compare the highlighter formula to Colourpop's super shock highlighters. Really nice and smooth. The blush is a powder, and you can take it from a sheer wash of color to a built-up, strong peach-pink. The packaging is also super cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m super happy with this little bento set! I only wish the bronzer was a powder instead of a cream. It seems odd to me to have a cream with 2 powders. Iu2019d prefer them all to be one or the other. Otherwise Iu2019m very happy with this, and canu2019t wait to use it for travel! (One day...)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I am a light skin tone and I got fair because I thought medium bronzer looked too deep online. I absolutely love fair but i went in store after buying and I definitely could have got the medium one which I like more because the blush is brighter. The product itself tho all three formulas of product, 10 out of 10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this little trio is so cute and so good! the cream bronzer blends beautifully and is the perfect shade for my medium skin tone. the highlight & blush are beautiful as well and are easy to apply. highly recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow I love this! Iu2019m a light-medium neutral skin tone so I first bought shade 2 Cloud Latte.  While I LOVED the blush, the bronzer was too dark for me and I didnu2019t love the undertone as I prefer something warmer or more golden.  So I took a shot at 1 Butter Up and Iu2019m in love! The blush is a beautiful, buildable formula that leaves a slight sheen on the cheek.  The bronzer is also buildable with a warmer undertone and it looks so natural.  I LOVE IT!  The highlighter I will use as an eyeshadow since I can see some sparkles in it but thatu2019s not a bad thing.  Effectively this makes the product and eye and cheek palette and Iu2019m a total sucker for those.  I couldnu2019t be happier with my purchase. One note:  I think it would have been better for Sephora to assign skin tone ranges because I went for the medium thinking 1 would be too light because it is marked for fair skin tones.  But it turns out that itu2019s perfect for me.  Try it though.  Itu2019s beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect u201ceasy summer go tou201d product! I got the light version and the shades are amazing for fair skinned people. Small... so perfect purse size. I love how blendable the cream bronze is. My only complaint is the blush is a little glittery.
